0                                   7453                     ¿þþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþÜ
                                    7454                     Ÿ    The following code generates an information line that can    Ÿ
                                    7455                     Ÿ     later be passed to the SETVINFO routine.  This information  Ÿ
                                    7456                     Ÿ      line can be saved in user data, so it's important not to   Ÿ
                                    7457                     Ÿ    change the format of the information (adding information at  Ÿ
                                    7458                     Ÿ      the end is OK though).                                     Ÿ
                                    7459                     Ÿ                                                                 Ÿ
                                    7460                     Ÿ      The format is:                                             Ÿ
                                    7461                     Ÿ                                                                 Ÿ
                                    7462                     Ÿ        VIEW=starting-lineno,flag,cursor-lineno,cursor-column    Ÿ
                                    7463                     Ÿ                                                                 Ÿ
                                    7464                     Ÿ  "flag" is 0 if the cursor is on the command line and 1 if the  Ÿ

 002710 41F0 0004            00004 20550                       LA    R15,4               Page is full
 002714 18D8/9808 D004_            20551              PAGLEXIT PEND
 DROP   WIND,R6

 DROP   *,R7

                                   21489              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                   21490              Ÿ  BACKFILL -- Local routine to find an existing line-number in       Ÿ
                                   21491              Ÿ    the window and fill in the previous lines with their             Ÿ
                                   21492              Ÿ    line-numbers.                                                    Ÿ
                                   21493              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                   21494              Ÿ    On entry:                                                        Ÿ
                                   21495              Ÿ      R1 - WIND ptr                                                  Ÿ
                                   21496              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                   21497              Ÿ    On exit, R15 (and cc):                                           Ÿ
                                   21498              Ÿ          -1 - no existing lines in the window                       Ÿ
                                   21499              Ÿ      lineno - first line-number in the window;                      Ÿ
                                   21500              Ÿ               R0 = no. of new lines which precede first lineno      Ÿ
                                   21501              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ

                                   22858              Ÿ  WINDSET -- Routine to set the default window.                      Ÿ
                                   22859              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                   22860              Ÿ    On entry:                                                        Ÿ
                                   22861              Ÿ      R15 - window number to become default                          Ÿ
                                   22862              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ

                                   24383              Ÿ  PAGEMOD -- Routine to display the current page and process         Ÿ
                                   24384              Ÿ    any updates.                                                     Ÿ
                                   24385              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                   24386              Ÿ    On exit, R15 (and cc):                                           Ÿ

0                                  29685              ¿þþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþÜ
                                   29686              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                   29687              Ÿ  FMTDUP -- Local routine to process defining the fields for         Ÿ
                                   29688              Ÿ    duplicate text lines.                                            Ÿ
                                   29689              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                   29690              Ÿ    This routine takes advantage of a special model terminal         Ÿ
                                   29691              Ÿ    sequence which duplicates the field definitions when multiple    Ÿ
                                   29692              Ÿ    lines have exactly the same definitions.  This greatly reduces   Ÿ
                                   29693              Ÿ    the number of definitions we have to sent.                       Ÿ
                                   29694              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                   29695              Ÿ    On entry:                                                        Ÿ
                                   29696              Ÿ      R6 - PWA ptr                                                   Ÿ
                                   29697              Ÿ      R5 - WIND ptr                                                  Ÿ
                                   29698              Ÿ      R4 - LINT ptr                                                  Ÿ
                                   29699              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                   29700              Ÿ    On exit, R15 (and cc):                                           Ÿ
                                   29701              Ÿ      0 - line was processed (line is a duplicate of previous)       Ÿ
                                   29702              Ÿ      4 - can't process line                                         Ÿ
                                   29703              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                                      ¾þþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþ»
0003F08 50E0 D000/9008_      00000 29704              FMTDUP   PROC
 USING  *,R7
 003F22 4130 0004            00004 29743                       LA    R3,4                Assume not a duplicate
                                   29744
 003F26 D601 6004 6004_00004 00004 29745                       IF    (PWAOROW,NZ),BEGIN  We have a prev text line...
 003F30 9180 BACB/4710_00ACB       29761  1                      IF    CPVFVTAM,EXIT       VTAM can't do this, scram
                                   29779  1
 003F38 D501 4002 6006_00002 00006 29780  1                      IF    (LINTWIND,EQ,PWAOWIND),BEGIN  Same window...
 003F42 9501 400C/4780_0000C       29798  2                        IF    (~LINFNEW,AND,~LINFTEXT),EXIT  Not a text line, scram
 003F52 1B33                       29830  2                        CLEAR R3                  This line is a duplicate
 003F54 47F0 70C8            03FEA 29834  2                        B     FDUPEXIT
 003F58                            29835  1                      END
                                   29839  1
 003F58 4820 4000            00000 29840  1                      LH    R2,LINTROW          Current row
 003F5C 0620                       29841  1                      DECR  R2                  Last duplicate line
 003F5E 4920 6004/47D0_      00004 29843  1                      IF    (R2,GT,PWAOROW),BEGIN  Multiple lines...
 003F66 4100 0001            00001 29860  2                        LA    R0,1
 003F6A 4A00 6004            00004 29861  2                        AH    R0,PWAOROW
 003F6E 4110 0001/58E0_      00001 29862  2                        TCURS (R0),1              Line after original

 003FAC 4110 785C/4100_      0477E 29957  2                        TSEG  ';'
 003FBE 1812/1B00/41F0_            29975  2                        TNUM  (R2)                Last duplicate row
 003FCC 4110 785D/4100_      0477F 29997  2                        TSEG  'z'                 Duplicate field attributes
 003FDE                            30015  1                      END
                                   30019  1
 003FDE D701 6004 6004_00004 00004 30020  1                      CLEAR PWAOROW,PWAOWIND    Reset
 003FEA                            30032                       END
                                   30036
 003FEA 18F3                       30037              FDUPEXIT LR    R15,R3              Set return code
 003FEC 18D8/9808 D004_            30038                       PEND

                                   31915              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                   31916              Ÿ  SCRLRGN -- Routine to scroll a region of text up or down           Ÿ
                                   31917              Ÿ    the specified number of lines.                                   Ÿ
                                   31918              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                   31919              Ÿ    On entry:                                                        Ÿ
                                   31920              Ÿ      R0 - first row                                                 Ÿ
                                   31921              Ÿ      R1 - last row                                                  Ÿ
                                   31922              Ÿ      R2 - row scroll map ptr                                        Ÿ
                                   31923              Ÿ      R15 - amount to scroll (positive scrolls down;                 Ÿ
                                   31924              Ÿ                              negative scrolls up)                   Ÿ
                                   31925              Ÿ                                                                     Ÿ
                                                      ¾þþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþ»

                                   32708                       ¿þþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþþÜ
                                   32709                       Ÿ  Since we have scrolled the lines the old line-number field   Ÿ
                                   32710                       Ÿ    needs to be set to the current line-number (otherwise the  Ÿ
